channel.title: VividScape :P
channel.description:
[center] [i][b]First Server i ever created - Update May 1st 2010-[/b][/i] --------- [b]Completed Tasks[/b]
[ul][li]Fight Pits - working timers[/li] [li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Barbarian Assaultt[/li] [li]Wins - make you fly[/li] [li]Items kept on death[/li] [li]Stat Screen[/li] [li]Corporal beast[/li] [li]Bandos God[/li] [li]Correct Specs[/li] [li]Correct Godsword stances.[/li] [li]100% Working Spec[/li] [li]DarK Bow Double hits 100% accuracy on special[/li] [li]God bow works correctly - same movement as dark bow[/li] [li]Full Statius,Vesta,Zuriels,Dragon Hai, and Full Elite Black added.[/li] [li]Spirit Shields added[/li] [li]Fire Cape animation[/li] [li]Custom Jaill Comand (Hell) Unique to my server only i think.[/li] [li]Shops are organized[/li] [li]Full Prayer System[/li] [li]Vengeance Works[/li] [li]D Claws - Spec included[/li] [li]Sara Sword - Spec Included[/li] [li]Dragon Fire Shield Works[/li] [li]Multi-Combat and Non Multi works[/li] [li]Stable Economy[/li] [li]1300 x 1* Exp Rates - thats okay?[/li] [li]Skills work, except mining and theifing[/li][/ul]
[b]Coming Soon[/b]
[ol][li]Mining[/li] [li]Theifing[/li] [li]New areas[/li] [li]Statius,Zuriels etc shop.[/li] [li]Slayer monsters edited.[/li][/ol]
[b]Pictures[/b]
[img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/tele.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/assaultahh.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/pestcontrol.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/hellzone.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/fightpits.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/corpmofo.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/bandosshit.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/awcrap.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/elementalstore.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/spiritshiels.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/statiusetc.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/doomsword.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/itemskeptondeath.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/agsspec.gif[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/bgsspec.gif[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/wingsfte.gif[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/godbows.gif[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/Untitled-4-8.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/randomshit.png[/img]
[b]Facts-[/b]
[ol][li]Sevrer Officialy Started April 28th-2010.[/li] [li]First Server Voxy (v0x) Ever created or put work into.[/li] [li]First server with the ::hell command[/li] [li]Wing models were not created by me, but by a server i wish to remain anonymous for the reason of hatred. I added the animation,requirements, and stats to them manually.[/li][/ol]
[b]Suggestions[/b] Im taking all Suggestions so if you see something you think could be better, or think something should be added let me know.
[/center]

item.title: VividScape :P
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

[center]
First Server i ever created - Update May 1st 2010-

Completed Tasks

[ul][li]Fight Pits - working timers[/li]
[li]Pest Control[/li]
[li]Barrows[/li]
[li]Barbarian Assaultt[/li]
[li]Wins - make you fly[/li]
[li]Items kept on death[/li]
[li]Stat Screen[/li]
[li]Corporal beast[/li]
[li]Bandos God[/li]
[li]Correct Specs[/li]
[li]Correct Godsword stances.[/li]
[li]100% Working Spec[/li]
[li]DarK Bow Double hits 100% accuracy on special[/li]
[li]God bow works correctly - same movement as dark bow[/li]
[li]Full Statius,Vesta,Zuriels,Dragon Hai, and Full Elite Black added.[/li]
[li]Spirit Shields added[/li]
[li]Fire Cape animation[/li]
[li]Custom Jaill Comand (Hell) Unique to my server only i think.[/li]

[li]Full Prayer System[/li]
[li]Vengeance Works[/li]
[li]D Claws - Spec included[/li]
[li]Sara Sword - Spec Included[/li]
[li]Dragon Fire Shield Works[/li]

[li]1300 x 1* Exp Rates - thats okay?[/li]
[li]Skills work, except mining and theifing[/li][/ul]

Coming Soon

[ol][li]Mining[/li]
[li]Theifing[/li]
[li]New areas[/li]

Facts-

[ol][li]Sevrer Officialy Started April 28th-2010.[/li]
[li]First Server Voxy (v0x) Ever created or put work into.[/li]
[li]First server with the ::hell command[/li]
[li]Wing models were not created by me, but by a server i wish to remain anonymous for the reason of hatred. I added the animation,requirements, and stats to them manually.[/li][/ol]

Suggestions
Im taking all Suggestions so if you see something you think could be better, or think something should be added let me know.

[/center]
